amendment.description: Amendment sought to express the sense of Congress that any authorization to appropriate increases to combined budgets of National Defense Budget (050) and Overseas Contingency Operations should be matched for non-defense discretionary budget.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 115-212 to express the sense of Congress that any authorization to appropriate increases to combined budgets of National Defense Budget (050) and Overseas Contingency Operations should be matched for non-defense discretionary budget.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 245 (Roll no. 358).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 245 (Roll no. 358).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Jayapal.
